cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 13th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 13th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Deluxe 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Dorm beds with privacy curtains, your own reading light and power socket with USB charging.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

dorms.name: Basic 5 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Second Most private dorm bed in Franz Josef after our 4 bed, privacy curtains around every bed, your own reading light and power socket with USB charging. No more being disturbed at night with some one else reading.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.
